00029 #ifndef BUSKEADHESIVEFORCE_HPP_
00030 #define BUSKEADHESIVEFORCE_HPP_
00031 
00032 #include "AbstractTwoBodyInteractionForce.hpp"
00033 
00034 #include "ChasteSerialization.hpp"
00035 #include <boost/serialization/base_object.hpp>
00036 
00044 template<unsigned DIM>
00045 class BuskeAdhesiveForce : public AbstractTwoBodyInteractionForce<DIM>
00046 {
00047     friend class TestForcesNotForRelease;
00048 private:
00049 
00051     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00058     template<class Archive>
00059     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00060     {
00061         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<AbstractTwoBodyInteractionForce<DIM> >(*this);
00062         archive & mAdhesionEnergyParameter;
00063     }
00064 
00072     double mAdhesionEnergyParameter;
00073 
00074 public:
00075 
00079     BuskeAdhesiveForce();
00080 
00084     double GetAdhesionEnergyParameter();
00085 
00091     void SetAdhesionEnergyParameter(double adhesionEnergyParameter);
00092 
00102     c_vector<double, DIM> CalculateForceBetweenNodes(unsigned nodeAGlobalIndex, unsigned nodeBGlobalIndex, AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>& rCellPopulation);
00103 
00112     double GetMagnitudeOfForce(double distanceBetweenNodes, double radiusOfCellOne, double radiusOfCellTwo);
00113 
00119     virtual void OutputForceParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile);
00120 };
00121 
00122 #include "SerializationExportWrapper.hpp"
